text: What a load of bullshit. Marketing is not about PLG, it's about doing what works for your customers and company. If that's PLG, great, but this is one of those nonsense statements from people that are so deep in their own rabbit hole, they haven't seen the sun nor any other situations than their own for a long, long time. It's the same as demand gen folks proclaiming SEO is dead, email is dead and all you should care about is organic and paid social.
